animeTitle: Counterattack System: I Maxed Out the Goddess’s Affection Meter
otherNames: Counterattack System: I Maxed Out the Goddess's Affection Meter, Counterattack System: I maxed out the goddess' favorability, 逆袭系统：我刷爆了女神好感度
synopsis: The male protagonist, Chu Ming, in his pursuit of true love, works multiple jobs daily to earn money, only to be heartlessly betrayed by his girlfriend. In his moment of despair, he awakens the "Counterattack System," which transforms him from a low-level worker into a hidden millionaire. However, he soon realizes that while he possesses immense wealth, he cannot directly access it. To achieve his comeback, freshly rising from rock bottom, he follows the system's instructions and becomes a "professional simp." Eventually, with the help of the system, Chu Ming ascends to the peak, turning his miserable life around and becoming an idol worshiped by many.
